general.gigTitle: develop crypto landing page, nft website, nft marketplace and web3 integration

sellerCard.oneLiner: Creative Web Developer: Specializing in ReactJS and Web3 integration
sellerCard.description: Experienced React Developer with a proven record of delivering high-quality web solutions. Led website development at AMARKA, tackling challenges like barcodes, sophisticated functionality, and API integrations. As a freelancer, independently built projects for CYCLOTURTLES, including Cycloturtle Market and Cycloturtle. Additionally, worked on various web applications like ASAC, NFT Bomb Upgrade, Nobody1, Safinp Bigwindog Main, and Thunder Cake.

description.content:
Crypto/NFT/Meme Coin/Presale Website & NFT Marketplace Design


Welcome! Need an attractive crypto landing page or website? You're in the right place.

With over 4 years of Dapp development experience, I create:


  • Crypto Landing Pages & Websites: Mobile-friendly, visually appealing designs.
  • Advanced Animations
  • Roadmaps
  • Wallet Integration: MetaMask, Trust Wallet, etc.
  • Reward Dashboards/Dapps: For token airdrops with web3 wallet integration.

Why Choose Me?

  • Unlimited Revisions
  • Quality Services
  • 100% Satisfaction
  • Adaptable Designs

Test Me! Lets bring your crypto project to life!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Does i write or code smart contract ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No , I need smart contract ready by your side . give me the deployed contract address or give me solidity code .

reviews.comment: Working with Jai Rawat was an exceptional experience! His professionalism and code expertise are top level. He's polite, cooperative, and possesses a deep understanding of the field.

it was a good deal.
this guy is professional.

I will keep make an order with him.
Thank you!
He did amazing with my website

He is very professional. I messaged him about a different issue, and he actually helped me on something else! He’s got a broad range of skill sets, and most importantly, he told me yes instead of no when I asked him to create things. 10/10 recommend!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words! It was a pleasure working with you as well, and I truly appreciate your professionalism and trust. Looking forward to collaborating again in the future!

reviews.comment: Jai Rawat exceeded our expectations with his professional and bug-free code expertise. His deep understanding and proactive communication ensured the project was delivered on time, and our requested customized modal for Web3 blockchain access turned out to be 100% identical to our Figma design template, as well as 100% functional. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for any blockchain development needs! 🙌
